full_text: Page 871 Epstein #76318-054 From [b(6); b(7)(C) To [b(6); b(7)(C) Date 2019/07/31 15:05 Subject: Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm Hi [b(6); b(7)(C) Wanted to clarify from our earlier conversation - Epstein does currently have a cellmate. He was placed with inmate Reyes #85993-054. Please let me know if you need more info. Thanks, [b(6); b(7)(C) [b(6); b(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836-[b(6); b(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665 Page 1691 DOJ-OGR-00025171
